bio.description: Looking for places to eat at. Email me at kyle_lasala@dlsu.edu.ph if you want to connect.

top_reviews.subject: Sisig is sisig, bow
top_reviews.body: The sisig is sakto. Not bad, but not the best either. I'd recommend going here every once in a while though.

top_reviews.subject: Ang sarap ng meats dito
top_reviews.body: RomBab is the best with thick-cut meats talaga. I love the pork belly and the beef. The chicken is also good, but I prefer the pork and beef.

top_reviews.subject: Not good, bland
top_reviews.body: You can barely taste the cheese. The food is bland and the service is bad. I don't recommend this place at all.

top_reviews.subject: Good but not enough serving
top_reviews.body: The food is good but you will finish their serving in not more than 5 bites. Still hungry after eating.

top_reviews.subject: Cheap and Delicious
top_reviews.body: You get free soup, the serving is so many!
